ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We are grateful to Shuwen Guan, School of Life Sciences, Jilin University, for his helpful plant identification. This work was financially supported by the Special Projects of Cooperation between Jilin University and Jilin Province of China (SXGJSF2017-1), and research funding from the National Natural Science Foundation of China (No.31870201). We thank Jilin Teyi Food Technology Co., Ltd. providing research funding and plant materials for this research.
